metaface.client
Class MetaFaceClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      metaface.client.MetaFaceClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MetaFaceHTTPClient, MetaFaceIndependentClient
public abstract class MetaFaceClient
extends Thread

This class defines the base level client behaviour for the MetaFace framework. It controls the facial animation rendering and speech sysnthesis. It also controls the mailine execution of the client for the framework.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard

Constructor Detail

MetaFaceClient

public MetaFaceClient(DigitalSignalProcessor digitalsignalprocessor,
                      DrawingArea drawingarea,
                      netscape.javascript.JSObject win,
                      IdleBehaviour ib)
Creates new NewMetaFaceClient

Parameters:
digitalsignalprocessor - The TTS DSP to be used in synthesising phonemes into speech audio
drawingarea - The drawing region for the MPEG-4 face
win - The JSObject window to access the web browser
ib - The idle behaviour to be employed by the client

updateWebPage

public void updateWebPage(String url,
                          String target)
This method updates a table of target frames and their current URL content. This method is called by the MetaFace Applet receiving JavaScript notifications.

Parameters:
url - The URL displayed within the target frame
target - The target frame
